select M.MOMENT_ID, M.BLOG_ID, M.ADD_URL, M.UPLOAD_START, M.UPLOAD_END, M.PUBLIC_SCOPE, M.LIKE_NUMBER, M.MOMENT_WRITE, M.WRITE_DATE, A.FILE_NAME, A.FILE_ROUTE, A.MEDIA_NAME, B.NICKNAME from moments M, media A, members B where M.moment_id=A.group_id and M.BLOG_ID = B.MEMBER_ID and moment_id = #{momentId}

INSERT INTO MOMENTS(MOMENT_ID, BLOG_ID, ADD_URL, UPLOAD_START, UPLOAD_END, PUBLIC_SCOPE, LIKE_NUMBER, MOMENT_WRITE, WRITE_DATE) VALUES (#{momentId}, #{blogId}, #{addUrl}, current_date, #{uploadEnd}, #{publicScope}, 0, #{momentWrite}, current_date)

select count(*) from moments M, media A where M.moment_id=A.group_id and M.blog_id=#{blogId} and M.UPLOAD_END >= trunc(current_date)
and rownum <=4
order by upload_start DESC

select M.MOMENT_ID, M.BLOG_ID, L.group_id, B.nickname, M.ADD_URL, M.UPLOAD_START, M.UPLOAD_END, M.PUBLIC_SCOPE, M.MOMENT_WRITE, M.WRITE_DATE, A.FILE_NAME, A.FILE_ROUTE, A.MEDIA_NAME from moments M, members B, media A, (select * from likes where member_id = #{memberId} and groups = '구독') L where M.moment_id=A.group_id and M.blog_id=L.group_id and M.blog_id=B.member_id and M.upload_end >= trunc(current_date)
and rownum <= 5
order by upload_start DESC

select M.MOMENT_ID, M.BLOG_ID, M.ADD_URL, M.UPLOAD_START, M.UPLOAD_END, M.PUBLIC_SCOPE, M.LIKE_NUMBER, M.MOMENT_WRITE, M.WRITE_DATE, A.FILE_NAME, A.FILE_ROUTE, A.MEDIA_NAME, B.NICKNAME, (select A.file_route from media A where M.blog_id = A.group_id and A.sub_group = '프로필이미지' and A.status = 'true') as profileImg from moments M, media A, members B where M.moment_id=A.group_id and M.BLOG_ID = B.MEMBER_ID and moment_id = #{momentId}
